snippet.title: Virtual Hunter | Lovna Dolina Rework Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Explore The New Lovna Dolina Reserve - Out Now!

Discover this vast and open hunting ground that offers a large biome diversity from grasslands to dense forests and rocky mountain sides. With improved landscape and environment details, this over four times bigger map will replace the old one. You can find all of the current animals from the map, enjoying their new territories. 

Key Features:
* Brand new map to replace the old one
* Massive 64km2 / 24.7mi open world
* Improved landscape and terrain detail
* Unique locations and points of interests
* Increased vegetation distance
* Improved animal animations & behavior
* Improved performance
* And much more!

Read full patch notes here: https://store.steampowered.com/news/app/1549850/view/4062878835620789835

Get the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1549850/Virtual_Hunter

Join our Discord server: https://discord.gg/gGmSAA8Prd
Follow us on Facebook: https://bit.ly/3DDP0QV
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/VirtualHunterVR
Website: http://virtualhuntervr.com

 #virtualhuntervr #vrgamesreview #virtualreality  #vrgaming #vrgames #gaming #indiegame #hunting  #huntinggame #gameplay #games
